short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beaker helps you shop sustainably by displaying ethical and environmental ratings for brands & products while you shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beaker's extension helps you shop more sustainably by displaying health, ethical and environmental ratings for brands & products, all while you shop. 

Conscious consumption is harder than ever with greenwashing running rampant. Let our extension help you navigate different companies' boasting about their sustainability and ethics.

Our proprietary rating system rates companies on their environmental and ethical footprints with a transparent methodology that allows you to break down exactly how we calculate our ratings, providing you with an easy way to understand what brands are good (or bad) while you're shopping.
